relnotes.name: Bluetooth CSY
relnotes.purpose: Comms Server CSY plugin providing serial port emulation over Bluetooth.

defect.title: .esk and .cmi files do not have header
SMP: migrate btcomm to Bluetooth logger

relnotes.defect: Change local logging to standard Bluetooth logger.

defect.title: LIBmm40820 APR: Esock_bt data abort in :~CHCICommandItem

relnotes.defect: Added additional code to suggested areas to help identify any overflows.

defect.title: BTComm thread does not get a unique name

relnotes.defect: Change to append Thread ID to thread name to ensure thread name is unique.

defect.title: btcomm, Kern-Exec 3 when trying to connect to pc

relnotes.defect: Changes made to btcomm to avoid panic when trying to connect to PC via bluetooth.
